official_title: A bill to direct the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to make grants to the City of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, to pay the costs of constructing the uncompleted portion of the Saw Mill relief sewer.
subjects: Federal aid to water pollution control

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to pay for the construction of a portion of the Saw Mill Run relief sewer in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. Limits the amount of funds which may be used and takes such funds out of Pennsylvania's allotment under the Federal Water Pollution Control Act.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to make grants to the City of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, to pay the costs of constructing the uncompleted portion of the Saw Mill relief sewer.
